Title: The Frustrating Thing About Psychopaths
Writer: Matthew Miller (created by), Sarah Nicole Jones, Tamara P. Carter (staff writer)
Actors: Ioan Gruffudd, Alana De La Garza, Joel David Moore, Donnie Keshawarz
Plot: When a human heart is delivered fresh out of a body to the homicide division, Henry and Jo end up in the middle of a Jack the Ripper copycat murder investigation. But it doesn't stop there....
